#summary PTF Status2Email: Send down and warning sensors by email
#sidebar PTF_Sidebar

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/status2emaillogo.png

PTF.!Status2Email by default sends the current alarms and warnings by email. The application can be used as a Custom Notification or as a scheduled task, sending an email every morning. You can use the -ss parameter to also report on Paused and Unusual sensors


PTF.!Status2Email requires the following parameters:
{{{
-pu=   PRTG username.
-pp=   PRTG password or passhash *
-ps=   PRTG server ip or domainname and optional portnumber.
-ms=   IP or domainname of your mailserver.
-fr=   The FROM address of the email to send.
-to=   The TO address to send the email to.
-ss=   Optional parameter for sensor statuses that need to be reported
       supported values are d(own), w(arning), p(aused) and u(nusual)
       e.g. -ss=dwpu (default = dw)
-ssl3  Optional parameter to force a SSL3 connection to your PRTG server.
}}}

{{{*}}} A !PassHash can be used instead off the given password. [PTF_CS_PassHashTool details]
